scripts.clean-dist: rm -r -f dist && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/js
scripts.copy: yarn clean-dist && cp -r -f src/images dist && cp -f server/*.php dist && cp -r -f src/css dist
scripts.build:dev: yarn copy && uglifyjs src/js/components/*.js src/js/services/*.js src/js/*.js -o dist/js/app.js
scripts.compile: yarn copy && uglifyjs src/js/components/*.js src/js/services/*.js src/js/*.js -c -m reserved=['opla'] -o dist/js/app.js
